topic.title: Exercise: expl003 - Selection Customers on zip code

section.p: Make a selection of customers whose zip code begins with 20 and are living in Amsterdam.
section.note:
ZipCode is a text field, so you can use text filters:
Text filter

section.title: Solution
section.p: Open the table Customers. Click in column City in a field with value Amsterdam. Choose tab Home Selection (group Sort & Filter) Equals "Amsterdam" . Click on the filter arrow at the end of column head ZipCode and choose Text Filters Begins with ... . Enter 20 and click OK.
